english.segment1: Our God is, a consuming fire, A burning holy Flame, with glory and freedom. Our God is, the only righteous judge, Ruling over us with kindness and wisdom
english.segment2: We will keep our eyes on You. We will keep our eyes on You
english.segment3: A mighty fortress is our God. A sacred refuge is Your Name. Your Kingdom is unshakable. With You forever we will reign
english.segment4: Our God is, jealous for His own. None could comprehend, His love and His mercy. Our God is exalted on His throne. High above the heavens. Forever HeÂ’s worthy..
english.segment5: We will keep our eyes on You. We will keep our eyes on You
english.segment6: We will keep our eyes on You. We will keep our eyes on You. So we can set our hearts on You. Lord we will set our hearts on You!
